      email
      totalImages
      lastClaimDate
      streakCount
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }

      streakCount
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }
";const updateUser=/* GraphQL */"

      category
      description
      imageUrl
      dateObtained
      createdAt

    }
  }

        rarity
        category
        description
        imageUrl
        dateObtained
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }

  }
